item.title: The ASUS EeeBook X205 is now available for purchase in India
item.description:
ASUS has introduced the EeeBook X205 to the Indian market. This 11.6-inch ultraportable laptop is designed to offer a user experience similar to a smartphone and is well-suited for young professionals. The EeeBook X205 features “connected standby technology,” allowing for near-instantaneous wake-up from sleep mode and continuous social connectivity, even in standby. Equipped with a quad-core Intel Atom processor, the laptop comes with Windows 8.1 with Bing and is offered in four colors: dark blue, white, gold, and red...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-asus-eeebook-x205-is-now-available-for-purchase-in-india/

item.title: There are many options to choose from when it comes to Intel mobile devices
item.description:
Thinking about buying a new PC? A laptop might be a better choice than a desktop, or maybe even a tablet. Intel powers a wider variety of devices than ever before. Sumner Lemon, Country Manager for Intel Singapore & Malaysia, points out that “2015 is the Year of the Goat - an animal known for being curious, clever, and ambitious,” adding that “Intel shares these values as we continue to innovate and push the limits of computing...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/there-are-many-options-to-choose-from-when-it-comes-to-intel-mobile-devices/

item.title: Asus introduces a portable LED projector with a 4K display
item.description:
The PB287Q is a 28-inch monitor with 4K ultra high definition. At CES last week, Asus, known for its consumer notebooks and motherboards, introduced new products designed for content creators and mobile professionals seeking enhanced performance and affordability. The company emphasized delivering bigger, better, and faster solutions. Among their offerings is the PB287Q, a 28-inch display with 4K ultra high definition (UHD) resolution. This slim-profile monitor features a full range of adjustments including swivel, tilt, pivot, and height, along with Splendid Plus video intelligence technology for optimal viewing comfort...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/asus-introduces-a-portable-led-projector-with-a-4k-display/
